page.title: 15A POLICEMAN IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: A police job is a hard and dangerous one in some ways.This job is split into different categories e.g.Traffic, Forensic,C.I.D.,Drug Squad,Fraud Squad and Autopsy.Forensic is a category where they do lots of medical tests on all sorts of different things.C.I.D. is short for Criminal Investigation Department and they do exactly what the words say,they investigate criminals.Say there has been a murder and someone saw him,the police would make up a face with Identikit and then they would look out for the criminal. Traffic Dept. is where you work on the streets.The Drug Squad work on catching people who are supplying drugs and they are helping the world to be a much better place without them.The Fraud Squad investigate frauds of money and even in Cheltenham all these police depts. are very busy.
